training_course_desc: Template used to print information about a training.
training_session_desc: Template used to print information about a training session.
training_event_desc: Template used to print information about a training event.
training_event_invitation_desc: Template used for the email invitation to a training event.
training_session_event_invitation_desc: Template used for the mail sent for the invitation to a training event.
training_session_invitation_desc: Template used for the mail sent for the invitation to a training session.
training_session_confirmation: Confirmation of registration for a training session
training_session_confirmation_desc: Template used for the email requesting confirmation of registration for a training session.
training_event_presences: Attendance grid for a training event
training_event_presences_help: Template used for printing the attendance grid (empty or pre-filled) of a training event.
training_event_presence: Certificate of attendance to a training event
training_event_presence_help: Template used for printing the certificate of attendance of a user to a training event.
training_session_presences: Attendance grid for a course session
training_session_presences_help: Template used for printing the attendance grid empty of a course session.
training_session_participated_desc: Template used when the participation is validated by tutors.
event_description_desc: The description of the session event
event_end_desc: The end date of the session event
event_location_address_desc: The address of the session event
event_location_extra_desc: Extra information about the location of the session event
event_location_name_desc: The location name of the session event
event_name_desc: The name of the session event
event_start_desc: The start date of the session event
event_trainers_desc: The list of the trainers of the session event
session_description_desc: The description of the training session
session_end_desc: The start date of the training session
session_name_desc: The name of the training session
session_start_desc: The end date of the training session
session_trainers_desc: The list of the trainers of the training session
training_quota_status_validated_desc: Template used when subscription is validated.
training_quota_status_managed_desc: Template used when subscription is validated with quota.
training_quota_status_refused_desc: Template used when subscription is refused.
training_quota_status_cancelled_desc: Template used when subscription is cancelled.
training_quota_subscription_created_desc: Template used when subscription is created.
